response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its value to you, I propose a special introductory price of $10,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a price that is more favorable than what others might expect.
